comment: Took Professor Doran during summer of 2025. His syllabus is clear and the learning objectives are hard to miss. You don't necessary need a textbook. Class consisted of 5 quizzes 3 exams and 3 discussions. Class wasn't necessary hard it's more memorization based than critical thinking. Professor Dorran gives weekly email updates and cares alot.

For 1101, 1130, & 3340. Very Caring + Fast Grader. For online classes: multiple extensions + all work available on day one. You can get 100s on everything. Once you're at a 90, you can stop. For 1130, 8 discussions, 10 quizzes, & 2 exams. For 3340, 10-page paper, 10 slide PPT, 1 page outline, 6 discuss, 10 quiz, 2 exams. Allows resubmission. TAKE!!
Does everything he can to help you succeed.
Such a great guy and teacher. Truly cares about each student. His class is an easy pass!

Such a great professor. Only grades are 4 tests but super easy and everything is on his powerpoints. Super straightforward, practice quizzes are helpful but not mandatory. No lockdown and open note. His lectures are super interesting and very open to questions, attendance not mandatory though. Very nice guy and easy class. Definitely recommend!!

Such a great professor. Only grades are 4 tests but super easy and everything is on his power points. Super straightforward, practice quizzes are helpful but not mandatory. No lockdown and open note. His lectures are super interesting and very open to questions, attendance not mandatory though. Very nice guy and easy class. Definitely recommend!!

Professor Doran is an amazing online professor. A quick grader and responds fast to emails. He lays out the whole course for you, so you can complete the class early if you want, he encourages it! All the work is straightforward and easy. Each module is a quiz and discussion. Some modules are just a quiz which is sweet. We only do midterm and final

Amazing professor! He explains everything really well, attendance is not mandatory but I would recommend going as it helps a lot with retaining information, and his exams are open note. I 100% recommend taking his class!

Super easy and super engaging class. Exams are open note, but I didn't even need my notes most of the time cause he's good at making you remember the information--just keep the powerpoints downloaded cause there will be map-related questions. He's very nice and easy to talk to. Come to class if you want extra credit.

Pretty chill guy. Optional quiz each week,I would copy the answers in a separate doc since he allows us to use notes. At first I was nervous for this class because I have a hard time remembering where things are in the world but he doesn't test on that. Attendance isn't required now, but he will probably give extra credit if you come next semester.
Take this class! He cares a lot about his students and is very open to questions. Encourages you to do well and to come to class, even though attendance isn't mandatory.

He is a great professor. I went to class maybe 3 times and the only assignments were tests. The tests were pretty easy. He even encourages students to look up answers if we do not know them. Great professor, take him.

His lectures are heavy, but they're interesting to hear. Attendance is not mandatory, he would give all students emails to let them know what is going on. Occasionally, he would repeat himself with the same content, but it doesn't side-track the lecture. Only 4 online exams. Overall, cool professor!

Overall I thought he was very nice and relatable. He was easy to talk to and tried to make you laugh. The class consisted of 4 test grades where the info would be on power points and covered in class. He wants all of his students to get an A.

Great professor! I just took him this semester and it was the easiest class ever. Grades consist of four exams and he does make his own test questions but they're easily accessible on the PowerPoint for the open note exams. It's very hard not to get an A in this class.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: just take his class!! easily my least stressful course so far. we had 4 graded tests and an optional extra credit assignment. he gives us the option to take practice tests and he goes over them in class, they're really helpful. he wants you to succeed and clearly enjoys what he teaches

He was AWESOME! Exams were straight from PowerPoint and lectures. Super good communicator & cares for the students. No lockdown browser on exams and lets us use resources! Xtra credit opportunity that drops your lowest exam grade. Overall really nice guy and made class enjoyable. Take his class!!

Yall, when I tell y'all this is one of the best professors ever. He only gives exams the entire semester, and they are open notes. Attendance is not mandatory. Lectures are posted on D2L, and they are simple to read and memorize. Take him. Easy A. You will thank me later. TAKE HIMM

Professor Doran is a great prof. Attendance is not mandatory but it really helps to show up for the tests. He is really understanding and wants you to succeed workload was light. Just study for your test and show up to lecture and you'll get an A. He posts his lectures on pptx so you will know what your lecture is on before class starts

Professor Dave is so kind! His lectures are really amazing and you can tell he really loves what he teaches. The work only consists of 4, online open note tests that are fairly easy if you use the review power point! And no mandatory attendance.

Took this easy A class with Professor Doran. Exams are straightforward, and the study guides cover most of the material. Attendance is mandatory but manageable. Unstuck study AI was a great tool for test prep.

It was a very easy class. I graded it based on exams and three fairly easy discussion posts. He gives feedback and responds to your discussion post, which I find nice since he engages with the class. I finished this course before the four-week period ended. This class is very hard to fail. Just take notes, and you should be prepared for the exam.

This was the easiest class I have ever taken. I took this over the summer as the 4-week online course. 5 quizzes, 3 discussions, and 3 exams. No lockdown browser or camera and all quizzes/tests have two attempts and the correct answers are shown after the first attempt. Discussions are graded leniently. TAKE THIS CLASS!!!

David Doran's lectures are interesting and don't really bore anyone. His tests are easy because there is no lockdown browser or webcam. He provides several extra credit opportunities for those who are in class. For those of us doing this for a prerequisite we want to not spend so much time working on it and in his class its informational and easy.
Learned so much from this course. It is an easy A, but you actually learn many things. Loved the professor! Super respectful and caring.

I took this course online during a four-week summer class and finished with an A. It was a lot of work but not impossible. I would 10/10 take this professor again. He would also email weekly to remind us of any assignments due.

Only graded on 4 exams. Not lockdown or camera and all answers are online or on the powerpoints he posts. Went to class 2 times all semester and ended with an A. Just keep up with exam dates so you dont miss them.

Great teacher and class is super straightforward. Graded by 4 tests (All online: No Lockdown) and the study guide he gives has most of the answers. You do not have to show up but sometimes he does give some information that is not on the study guide that will be on the test. Would highly recommend to take him as many times as you can.
Too easy. I stopped showing up and still passed because it's literally an open-book class. He even encourages people to look up their test when they don't know the answers. I'm not complaining!
Took him for GEOG 1125, super easy class take him!

4 grades in the semester were all tests. He's a good professor, the class might be the easiest class you can take. The study guides basically have 90% of the answers to exams. Attendance is suggested, he adds things to the exam that were directly taken from a lecture, or about people that came in to speak in class about different programs at KSU.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!!! He is amazing!! Attendance is not mandatory at all. The class consists of only 4 tests and they are all online without a lockdown browser or camera. If you need an easy A, take him. Trust me you wouldn't regret it.

Prof. Doran was very friendly and funny. Lectures are not mandatory but help when preparing for the tests. I barley went to class and still passed. Read/take notes and you WILL pass the tests easily. No textbook and mostly teaches off PowerPoints that are accessible. He also rounds grades! Overall, very easy class!
definitely recommend this course. barely went class and still got an A. I would recommend that you go to the review sessions for the last two tests as they are harder than the first two.
he's super nice and definitely passionate about what he is teaching. attendance is not mandatory at all but the only grades are four test grades which are open book with no lockdown or webcam

I loved going to Professor Dave's lectures. I enjoyed and was able to relax and just listen, as the information that he states and says is literally on the test. It is very presentational, so beware their are times it can get boring, but overall amazing professor and very understanding.
Doran is just such a good teacher. Just go to class, listen to the lectures and you will excel. Cannot recommend enough.
Much respect towards Professor Dave, I honestly enjoy his classes even at 9am, to just be able to relax and understand the subject by just listening to him says a lot.

Great professor with an enjoyable Intro to Geography class! Attendance isn't mandatory, and all lecture notes are posted online. Grade is solely determined off 4 non-lockdown online exams. There's a textbook, but the lectures are enough to get high scores. If you have any trouble, attend his lectures - they spell everything out nicely!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: I took his online 4 week summer course it consisted of 24 assignments overall and 1 opportunity for extra credit. Some of the assignments were a little time consuming but pretty easy overall. Loved this class would def take him again.

Such a fantastic professor. If you want an easy A, this is the class you want to take. There are a couple of quizzes; most are optional, but they help when it comes to the test. The test is all online, with no lockdown browser, and the answers for the test are in the powerpoints word for word. TAKE HIM!!! Best professor I've ever had at KSU.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Doran's class is very structured and easy. He is very nice and understanding, always willing to give extensions for assignments. I highly recommend him!

Such a great professor! He is SO kind & answers emails almost instantly. He explained to me what I needed to work on in order to succeed in his class. He's very kind and is always willing to help. Study and study his lectures, watch the videos, & read the textbook- that is how you will pass. HIGHLY recommend and would take again!
Easiest A you will ever get. All the work is completion grades and you could finish the entire course with an A in just a few hours if you really wanted to.

TAKE THIS CLASS!!! EASY A!!! GPA BOOSTER!!! Easiest class of my life. Everything is for a completion grade. It doesn't get any easier than this fellow scholars. Sit back, sip some root beer (best drink obv), do the little work thats assigned, eat some m&ms (best candy obv), and GO GET THAT A FOLKS!
He is an amazing professor and doesn't give a lot of coursework. Very understanding and easy grader. If you have a chance to take this class I 100% recommend it.
I really liked professor Doran. He was really nice and always took student feedback. You don't have to attend this class but he would give out the lab answers to those who came. Take his class!
Soooo I never showed up to this class besides the first day of add drop (really bad I know) and I still ended with an A. all the work is online and is just completion grades.
EASY A! Everything from smartbooks, labs, and exams were solely completion. Very hard to fail and you can finish early if you just get ahead.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Lots of homework

comment: Really nice guy. Doesn't want to overload you with work. It is nearly impossible to get below an A+ in this class. Units are due every two weeks, so you have plenty of time to do them. You can work ahead and finish the class within the first week if you really wanted to. Take him if you want a stress-free class in your schedule!
Amazing prof the work could be a lot here and there but it was definitely manageable! Great class with a great prof! I would definitely recommend him to anyone.

All of the assignments are straight out of the book, you do not need to come to lectures ever. You can redo small assignments and quizzes unlimited times and the tests were auto 100s (not sure he realized this lol). I finished with a 100 in the class, it's a great GPA booster.
Do you want a free A? Take this class.
Really teacher and a really easy A. He cares about his students and the only downside is probably the smartbook assignments.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Every week he assigns an exam, workbook, and a quiz. the quiz he gives answers to is usually on Wednesdays but he will let you know when he does. Everythings is online for him and it's not hard at all. Take him, he's a chill teacher. It can get overwhelming at one point if you do everything last minute SO DON'T DO THAT!
Amazing professor, gave us a lot of time to complete assignments and labs! Definitely would like to have a teacher like Mr.Doran again

BEST PROFESSOR EVER! TAKE HIM! Best online class, easy easy A. Says textbook is reqd, but I haven't used it. He knows that this is a gen ed course so makes it super simple to do well. After the first month of class, all assignments were posted for the rest of the semester so you can finish at your own pace. Grades easy and quickly.

As someone with an anxiety disorder, this class is set up so you learn material without the fear and stress of failure. He cares about his students and has a great personality. Attendance is not mandatory but I would still almost always attend class because he makes class interesting and teaches exactly what needs to be taught. Thank you, Dave!

Easiest class you will ever take. Everything is graded on completion, even the tests, do it and get a 100, or don't and get a 0. He also uses the point system which means when you reach the grade you want, you're done with the class and can stop doing the work. If you do the work, it's a guaranteed A.

You could probably not show up to class once and still get an A in the course. Everyone shows up the first week then after that, no one goes to class. Then prof mentions that the attendance bothers him so much yet does nothing about nor seems to understand why no one goes to class when its clearly obvious.

Professor Doran was a really good professor to have, especially if you are transferring from High school into college. He made college a lot more easier to deal with, since he is a very understanding professor. He also is very quick to answer back emails, and is very good communicator with the entire class. I would 100% take his class again.

Professor is nice and extremely laid back. Really great guy however the way his course is set up is a joke. Everything is online and can be done from home so everyone realizes there's no need to go to class and no one shows up after the first week. Exams are participation grades and prof mostly just gives answers to other assignments.

Professor Doran's class is what a lot of GenEd classes should be. He's very laid back and understands most students are simply in it for credit hours. The work is due biweekly and tests are all participation grades. It is 3 assignments, smartbook work, quiz, and lab. He cares about what he teaches and is very kind. One of the nicest teachers at KSU

Easiest A you can get if you need the class for credits. If youre struggling Id advise to go to class and make sure he knows your face and name for a little boost (not guaranteed). There are few assignments which he basically gives answers to but it can be done at home. Overall hes very nice and adjusting to doing lectures so cut him some slack.

This is basically an elementary school class. No one goes to class and you learn nothing. He gives you the answers to the test the day before. What a waste to actually pay money to learn something in college.

this is a waste of a course. the professor tries to make it sound so hard yet its easier than elemantary school class. you will not learn a thing and still get an a. do not take this professor if you actually want to feel like you are in college and get your moneys worth to actually learn something. unbelievable...

Want an easy, free A? Then, here's where you will get it. The prof is very nice and extremely laid back. There is Smartbook assignments which are easy but kinda tedious with how much there is, labs that he usually just gives you the answers to, and then exams which are completion grades. Bi-weekly due dates. Only 20 out of like 200 people show up.

There is a decent amount of work that you have to do but it's bi-weekly. It is not difficult although it takes quite long. If you take 4 or so hours in one day you can knock it out or you can do it little by little. I would take him though, pretty sure all grades for McGraw are completion.

Everything is a participation grade, even test. Nothing is actually graded. Seriously take this professor. He uses a point system, when you reach the grade you want you can just stop doing the work. Work and test due biweekly, sketches due every three weeks. Seriously the easiest A I have ever gotten. You will need the online text book.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class was made to pass with an A. Nice professor and everything is online, smartbook assignments, chapter exams and every now and then some sketches. Definitely take this class.
Easy A

Professor Doran is the sweetest professor ever, and 1113 was the easiest class I have ever taken. You have LS assignments (which are time-consuming but easy), a quiz, and a sketch due for each module every OTHER week. No final exam, everything is open note/Internet, and no lockdown browser.
He gives you the answers in the review session before each test so why go to class ever? Easier than elementary school. Easy A but you won't learn a thing.
He's amazing! Actually teachs, and gives good feedback. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. He might seem easy but if you don't put in the work dont expect a good grade.
It should tell you everything you need to know when the only bad thing people post about him on here is that the 1101 level intro class they took with him was easy! XD

I'd taken two of his classes and if you are not a GEOG major and want a related study or elective, TAKE HIM! For both of his classes, test and quizzes were online and they do have a very short time limit on them, so i did feel rushed. But he gave us the class off after the superbowl. Such a bro! I wish I could take more of his classes for credit
open book tests at home. ridiculous at college level. most people don't attend. waste of a course. arrogant.

most people do not go to class and just show up on review days. it's hard to believe a college professor will give studyguide and answers on review day so no one shows up. Disappointed that I didn't learn a thing. Take Slomovitz for history. You'll actually learn and enjoy his lectures.

Professor Doran is super cool. He is so nice and really cares about his students and knows that material. I took it as a hybrid class and his tests and quizzes were online. He lectures directly about the test. Just show up to class and listen. Review the online quizzes and powerpoints on D2L before the test and you'll get an A.

It is taught like an elementary school class. Test should not be online and open book. Im disappointed in my first semester at college. My high school classes were harder than this. Should have real tests in the classroom.

Pretty simple class. He's a great professor; accessible out of class; clear about what exactly will be on the tests; 4 tests online that are pretty simple if you attend class, especially on review days. Would recommend him.

Professor Doran is such a kind and caring man. His knowledge of the history of Europe is just astounding. If you want to get a good grade in an upper-level history class take him and take this class. He is there cause she truly wants all of his students to pass. 10/10 would recommend

Professor Doran is awesome! Attendance is not mandatory, so a lot of people skipped and would show up for the test review. I was in every single class, and took really good notes and got high A's on all four tests (only grades!) If i ever had a question he would answer it and make sure I understood it. I highly recommend taking him!
Great! Take him

The only grades in this class are 4 tests, but they are open note/book tests. No textbook required, so all notes are located on D2L and you can use them while testing. He is super nice and very easy to talk to if you are having a problem with anything.

By far the best professor I have ever had at KSU! He genuinely cares about his students, as well as the material he is teaching, and wants everyone to succeed. 4 tests that are super simple especially if you go to the review class before the test. Such a great guy! Wish I could take him again.

He cares a lot about his students and all of his tests (there's 4) are online, open note and open internet (no lockdown browser). He sometimes gives bonus questions so it's good to come to class. Definitely recommend!
Great professor!! Perfect balance of being easy, but not too easy. If you pay attention in class, you will be good! Such a good guy, and no attendance required. Love him!!!

There is no required attendance. He posts all of his lectures online. There are 4 tests but dont worry, all online. He gives you a day before the class date to take them no class on test dates. If you miss class, powerpoints are online. Also, the day before the test he has a review of what is going to be on it. He also gives bonus questions.

Like all of his reviews, GREAT professor! Intro to human geo is easy- show up to class and youll pass. Lectures online, accessible, gives free test questions if you show up! Tests online with no lockdown and he says look up answers you dont know. Such a kind person and very willing to help with anything. TAKE HIM!!!!!! Best decision Ive made.

His lectures are literally just to get you ready for the exams. He tells you "I won't ask this on the exam" or "you need this for the exam", he posts all of his powerpoints. Very direct! No attendance is taken, and exams are online without a lockdown browser. He literally TELLS you to look stuff up on the exams.

really easy, but the only thing you have in that class are 4 tests. they are easy, usually 50 questions, just make sure you study for them if you want to get an A. You dont need to show up for class just the review days and youll be fine.
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Amazing lectures

comment: Only 4 test grades and nothing else. All lecture PowerPoints are posted on D2L. Attendance isn't mandatory. I didn't go to class any other days except the lectures that were review before test day. Super easy class.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: Good thing Clemson allowed him to teach World Regional Georgaphy over here because his class was so easy. Exams were pretty straightforward, and he devoted the class day before exams as review sessions where he basically told us what was on the exam. I don't know if he will teach at Clemson again, but take him if he does.

Easy. EASY. Take him if you're looking for an easy A. 4 test, attendance not mandatory, review day the class before the test, tests online and out of class. I only went to review day and made 96, 92, 94, and a 60 (because i missed one exam and had to take the 10 question retake). So take him & don't forget to take the tests.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Take him!! 4 tests - all online (NO LOCKDOWN BROWSER!). For sure an easy A. Show up on review days, and he gives most of the answers. His PowerPoints are online, and cover everything on the tests! No reason to not take him!! However, he mentioned making class mandatory for next semester, so be aware of that.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Super chill dude, and I never went to class which was a shame because he was a nice and smart guy. Everything's online including the test but if I didn't live off campus I'd definitely go to more of his classes

Y'all, TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! I'll admit that his power-points confused me a bit but that was not an issue since he reviews for the four OPEN NOTE/OPEN WEB/ ONLINE exams the class period before the exam and gives you ALL the info and even some answers! Easy class! But he mentioned that attendance may become mandatory since so many people skipped.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Only grades are the 4 tests, which are all online!! He is amazing- class has never lasted longer than 45 minutes. You only have to go to the class before tests because its the review where he gives all the answers to the test... AMAZING professor I wish I could take him for every class for the rest of my life!!! 23/10 recommend!
Best professor I have ever had. I would take him again for sure. If you show up to class every once in a while or have a friend fill you in on lectures then you'll be fine. He is the best!!
rating_tags: Respected--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: TAKE HIM! I've taken him twice (once as an elective). Doran is awesome! He's class is fun and interesting. He makes it very easy for everyone to make a high B or A. Come to class, take notes, you'll make an A. Four online test - very easy! He may show a movie or two, but it makes for an easy test. No text book needed. I never studied and made an A.

If you have the option to take this professor, then do it! He only grades you on 4 tests, which are all online. He even told us to google questions that we didn't know! It was such an easy A. I went to class just so I could write down the notes (which was helpful bc he tells you what's on the test). You don't really need to go to class to pass.

Easiest A ever! I stopped going to class after the first exam, and still made A's on the rest of the tests. I would only recommend skipping class if you have friends in there who go, because he usually gives test questions/answers during lecture. There is no final, attendance is optional, he doesn't use lockdown browser, and no textbook. Take him!

David is a great guy that has a passion for geography. Does not take attendance but show up to the lectures and he will teach you everything you need to know. This makes test seem easy. 4 test all online, my lowest test grade was 96. No homework just class and test. Take him!!!!

THE BEST PROFESSOR EVER. TAKE HIM. He is so easy, and soooooo sweet. I hate anything relating to history but made a 95 in his class because he has 4 tests which are each 25% of your grade. Lectures arent mandatory but i go out of respect and he gives out the test answers and questions in class. so easy, and best professor ever. take him.

Enjoyed class the entire semester. Not a class where attendance is mandatory but I would go to because he gave out information that was helpful for the exams. Professor Doran is straight forward with what he expects out of you and what he expects you to learn. Puts all his information online and powerpoint so you can pay attention while in class.

Theoretically, you could just never show up to class and still pass using only the review ppt's that he emails out. But, you would be missing out on a great show. He gets very excited about the subject he teaches, and even more excited when students ask questions. He has an obvious passion for the subject. Tests are easy. Very knowledgeable man.

Mr. Doran is, by far, the best professor. There are 4 online tests in D2L  and all open note. He doesn't take attendance, but his tests are the exact same examples he says in class based off of his power points. Definitely go to class and take notes because it will make the tests 10x easier than they already are. He is so amazing. Take him!!

Doran is awesome. All the power points he posts online along with study guides and review slides. I definitely recommend going to the review classes if nothing else. All tests are open book and online and you only have four.

Such a sweet and caring guy. I never go to class and I have gotten A's on all of his exams so far. They are all online WITHOUT lockdown browser. He does not take attendance, and the only grades are 4 exams, the last one being a regular test as opposed to a cumulative final. TAKE HIM!!!!!

David Doran is one of the best professors here at Kennesaw. I had to take him for the 2 credit Geography and then they changed it to a 3 credit. He lectures the whole time during class but they are usually very interesting. I made an A the first time and I can already tell I am going to have another A. He also understands if you can't come to class

Professor Doran is amazing. If you are looking for an A then take his class. He's literally the nicest teacher ever and really cares about his students. All of his tests are open book. If you need an then take him!
Easiest class I ever took. Test extremely easy if you take notes in class. He does reviews before the test. If you want a straightforward class take this one.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Great professor! You can tell he loves what he does, and makes lectures as painless as possible. Only 4 online open-book tests, but super easy to get a good grade. Attending class is not mandatory, but his powerpoints do not give all the information that he says in class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Amazing lectures

comment: If you're taking this just to satisfy a general requirement and would rather have more time for your other classes, this might be the one for you. It's taught at a high school level, attendance and reading the text are optional, and the open-book tests are just regurgitation of what he's said multiple times in lectures.

Class is so easy. Although attendance isn't mandatory, I still think you should go OUT OF RESPECT. Could've made an A had I payed attention a little more, but its very straightforward. Best professor ever. So nice and caring
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: You only get 4 exam grades for the semester, so it's important to do good on those. Attendance isn't mandatory but he gives the answers to bonus questions in class. Reviews exam material the class before the exam and doesn't have class the day of the exam and you take it online.  I received a B because I never went to class.

Only have 4 exam grades for the entire semester, but if you download the review powerpoint, then you will easily pass. Will give extra credit questions to people who show up to class. Cares about his students and their grades. Very passionate about Geography and made the class interesting even though most students there were not Geography majors.

Literally so nice. This class has nothing to do with my major but I still really enjoyed it because of Professor Doran. Go to class because he is awesome and deserves the respect- or else you will miss a lot of examples and bonus questions for the test. Class is really interesting too. Always lets us out early and has review days. Wonderful guy.

TAKE HIM IM NOT KIDDING. Best prof ever for an easy grade. Attendance isn't mandatory, but his tests are made up of the examples he uses in class, so it's a good idea to go. His tests are online, open browser, open note, open everything. He cancels class on test days which is nice too. He uploads his ppts daily. Also he's super sweet!!

David Doran is simply the best. He truly cares about his students. His class was great, I learned a lot and made a high A on every exam. 4 exams, equally weighted (25%). Review PowerPoints prior and you will make a 100. Attendance is not mandatory, but he gives out test questions for going so I went (and he is pretty funny so the class was fun!)
Like the song simply the best! Coolest ever take him!

Boring.  Like a middle school teacher. Encourages students to not come to class  lazy so he gives online tests. Gives answers to those that attend.  Movies because he doesn't want to teach.   Hard to believe he is allowed these teaching methods in college. Should encourage students to actually learn something instead of only coming on review days

Didn't go to class once, though he seems like a great professor. Tests are online and very, very easy. Attendance is not mandatory. 4 online tests make up your grade, no final. Definitely just a class to help your GPA, and that is exactly what it did.
He's so easy! He considers his class a GPA buster. No book required

Easy A! Class is not being offered again though. His tests are online and he posts everything online. Just 4 tests in the class and two of them were about movies. Easy.... The class was eight weeks. Gives questions in class if you go on the exam and the answer. Take him for other classes. He is so nice, down to Earth, and very approachable! :)

Professor Doran was the man! He does not take attendance, but will definitely be willing to help you more if he sees you in class regularly. Only four grades all semester, all open note, online tests. GO TO REVIEW DAYS and you'll know everything you need to know. Would take him again in a heartbeat!

I took for GEOG 1101 and it was the easiest class ever. I never went to class, just downloaded the powerpoints for the four tests he assigns. The tests are ALL open notes and he cancels class the day of the test.

So there's four tests and those are your only grades. I would recommend going to the class, because he awards attendance by giving out test questions. You will pass if you don't go to class but you probably won't get an A even tho the test are online. Overall, TAKE THIS CLASS. Its simple and it has no outside work besides the four tests.

I never went to class after the first day and I passed with a 88. Super easy, just 4 tests! He always responds to emails in a timely manner and he genuinely cares about his students. Definitely take him!
I just signed up for my second class with him. He's AWESOME & completely prepares you for the tests. Would recommend him to anyone.
He's such a good teacher! Tells you exactly what will be on the test (and there aren't many) He made the lectures interesting and relevant

Best class I have taken so far! 10-week course. Only grades are 4 exams equally weighted at 25%.The class is based on 3 movies. He gives out answers to the test when people stop coming to class. . All the answers can be found in the review power points and he also has review sessions the day of the exam. HIGHLY RECOMMEND PROFESSOR DORAN!

Easiest class I'm taking the semester. 10 week course. Only grades are 4 exams equally weighted at 25%.The class is based on 3 movies. He gives out answers to the test when people stop coming to class. Lectures after the movies can be tedious. All the answers can be found in the review powerpoints and he also has review sessions the day of the exam

4 tests, all 25%. Last one is cumulative final. Super easy. Open note and online. He even says it is open Google. He doesn't want to see you taking it with someone but it's fine. Very easy class, he says it is fine to skip. Just go to review sessions before each test and you are golden.

David Doran is the man. Best professor Ive ever had. He's the kindest man and gives very helpful information in the review for exams, which are the class period before the exam. Very lovable guy, would let him be my dad in .2 seconds.

Class had to be one of the easiest classes ever. Most answers are given in class so going to class is strongly recommended. 4 tests all online. Really easy. Basically class was watching movies and going over what you needed to know from them after. If you want an A take this class and go to class.
Easy tests taken off of powerpoints he shows in class. classes are cancelled alot. You'll watch alot of movies. Have your popcorn ready.

If you want an easy A, take him! On the 1st day he even said he wanted his class to be a GPA booster. You only have 4 tests and they are all online so you can use your notes. He also puts all power points online. Attendance isnt mandatory. You would have to just not care at all and not try to receive less than an A. We need more professors like him

He is an awesome teacher.  His lectures are interesting, and we watched 3 movies in his 10-week geography class. The only work we have in this class are tests, all of which are online and open-note.  He's a really nice guy who is always willing to help you if needed.  I would definitely take his class again!
Really easy class. Only 4 exams, all online and he tells you the answers in class and posts ppts on D2L.

Cool guy! You'll want to attend b/c he gives test answers out esp when many people don't show up. Tells you exactly what you need to know & don't need to know for the test. Only 4 online exams & he tells you to use your notes & the posted PPTs for the tests. He lets class out early A LOT & he shows lots of movies. TAKE HIM! HE IS AN EASY A!

Doran is a great teacher and makes the information very clear. You don't have to buy a book if you take his large lecture class. There are 4 exams in the class and those are the only grades. Doesnt take attendance either.

He's a great teacher. You won't need to open the book at all so do not even buy it. He gives you test answers in class and all his exams are online with no google lock and open notes. Easiest class ever. Attendance is not mandatory or necessary.

If you need Geog 2105, TAKE HIM! Extremely easy, 4 online test, and gives out free answers to questions during class that will be on test. Lets class out early. 2 of the test are over movies we watch in class (Blood Diamond and Amistad).No textbook assigned. He makes it hard to fail! Easy A!

Doran is by far one of the best professors I've had. His tests are online--Open Google he says. He gives you answers to test questions if you attend class, and we spent alot of time watching movies! Would definitely take again.
Best class I've ever taken in my life he's too cool. I'm the kind of guy that hates class and doesn't take time to do stuff like rate my proffers to but he was so good I had too
FAVORITE PROFESSOR OF ALL TIME!

Super easy. 10 week class, 3 exams on D2L, 25 multiple choice questions, 30 minute time limit, open notes. puts his power points on D2L. Doesn't take attendance but gives test questions/answers if you are there.  watched 3 movies and a documentary & tested over them. no midterm, but a final of 50 multiple choice questions. definitely recommend!!!
Fantastic Teacher, take him!!!!!!!!!! you won't regret it.

Boring class and boring teacher.  You can't miss a class or you miss the test questions.  He doesn't use the book so get a buddy for notes.  Online tests, but you have to go to all classes for the answers.  Don't like his attitude.

If ANYONE has a problem with Prof Doran, the problem lies with them, NOT him. I have been a student for many, MANY years, and he is one of the best professors I have ever had. Students who have issues with him, I assure you, have issues with ALL of their professors and are just plain bad students. TAKE ANY OF HIS CLASSES. You will not be sorry!

Doesn't really teach.  Just gives out answers to those who come to class and then laughs at the people who miss.  Most of the class skips and comes only on class review days.  Why he gives out answers on class review days I will never know.  He would get more people to attend if he actually taught from his lectures and made people study.
Just don't ask him about your grade.  He only likes his A students.  Disrespectful.  should be teaching high school

Take him. No tests are dropped so no final. He is amazing. He actually teaches what you need to know, so as long as you attend class and take notes of everything he says, you'll do well. He is a nice guy and tries to show movies at the end of each unit. Review days are really helpful. He is also interesting and there if you have any questions.

I only went to a few classes that weren't the review session or  movie days. When he lectures he usually made it interesting and only kept you for an hour at most. If you go he gives you test questions at the end. Either way it is an easy A. 4 tests, all online, no lockdown browser. Print off his PPTs for tests. Taking again in fall for GEO 2105.

I only went to the review sessions before each test. Otherwise I did not attend a normal lecture. Easy A.  Only showed up 4 times and the tests are online and so simple. No need for the book. Just use the power points he gives you and you will easily get an a.

Only 4 tests but if you come to class he doesn't lecture that long and he usually makes it interesting and gives bonus questions then you will do fine. All test are online with time period. As long as you don't be lazy you can get an A.

Don't like this man.  He wants half of his class to get a's and the other half to get f's.  if you ask him about your grade, he berates you and immediately asks you if you have come to class.  His tests are online and timed, but you don't have time to attempt to google the answers so you better not miss one class.  I

Took Doran for Geography 1101, he is amazing! He gives out bonus questions for every test if you come to class. He makes lectures interesting and always ends class early if you do attend. Easy A, all tests were online, open book, open note, and not in a lockdown browser. He was always available if you had any questions. Would take again!!!
He doesn't care what your excuse is for not attending class.  He was quite sarcastic to me when I asked him about my test grade.  Shouldn't be teaching with his I don't care about anyone attitude.

Doran was a great prof. He was a great transition teacher for me coming right out of high school. He made that big scary college feel go away. Four online tests throughout the semester, go to class and write down what he talks about (It will be on the test)

Professor Doran is a great professor. There are only 4 tests with no midterm or final. The entire grade is just the average of the 4 tests. Gives clear notes in class, and will tell you exactly what to expect each test. All of the tests are open notes. I bought the book, and I didn't even open it. Great professor would recommend for an easy A.
Rudest professor I have encountered in my 3 years at Kennesaw.  Don't ever disagree with him or question what he says.

Great instructor, only 4 tests, no final or midterm, he answers questions, and is very nice. Would totally take him again! His notes are really clear and his test come from the bonus questions he gives at the end of each class and the notes. Notes are allowed to be used on all tests.
By far the easiest class. 4 tests, all open note open book. Class is not mandatory. He posts the PowerPoints online.

Professor Doran is an easy grader. He tells you what you want to look for in a test or quiz. Don't really need the book. He's nice and his lectures are to the point. He cuts his classes and lets us out in 30 minutes.

Even though tests are online,  it is very hard to google answers.  YOu will run out of time.  He makes sure you will not be able to google most of the questions, so don't think that you will not have to study.  Find someone who never misses class and share their notes.
condescending and rude.  should be teaching high school.  don't question anything.  don't waste your money buying a book.   lecture only tests.  like i said, don't ever question him

I took his class in the spring and he doesn't care if you are sick and have to miss class a week.  Since the tests come from his lectures, you cannot do well if you do not come to class with your computer and type up notes.  You should stick with a class that actually uses a book in case you have to miss since he doesn't use a book at all.

You guys must be kidding that this class is easy.  Easy that you have no homework, but not easy tests.  Sure they are online, but they are hard. It's hard to google any answers and the answers are NOT found in your textbook.  You have to go to the lectures and take thorough notes.  If you skip a class, you're in trouble.

Class is super easy. Class is just 4 tests weighted equally and all at 100 pts. Helpful, gives review before tests and also has powerpoints of the answers and gives test questions in class. Tests is online done at home and is open book. Encourages students to cheat and use web and powerpoints to find answers. Easy A!

Professor is very amiable and shows great interest and excitement for the subject. Could be more challenging and could go deeper into the material.  Many class members made little contribution and there was too much chatter during the lectures.
Easy class. Tests are online. Lots of bonus questions. Coming to class is worth it; if not a B is very doable. You can look up stuff online while you take your tests no lock down browsers.
Great Professor, a class act all around. Take him if you know whats good for you

This class was easy. I only went on review days, and I got a 98 as my final grade. Just make sure you write down everything he says on the review day. Also, you can google the rest. Super easy. Take him, if you need an easy A.
Easiest class ever. Four online, open book exams. No other assignments. I only go to class on review days and I made A's on every test.

Only 4 tests. All online. All open note and he posts a powerpoint with only the information that is on the test. Class not mandatory. Has review sessions the classes before each test. Very helpful. TAKE HIM!

4 tests are only grades.  Go to class & type everything he says, everything.  His PowerPoints help but don't contain hardly any information for the take-home online tests. I got a B because I used his PowerPoint for the 1st test & had no notes of what he said. If you want an A, go to class. He lets out early too. Don't use textbook at all. 89.5=A

Professor Doran is a AMAZING INSTRUCTOR. He lets you know exactly what is needed for you to get an A in his class. He answers any question you have and is passionate about Geography. This is my second time taking a class taught by him. If I could I'd take him again.

This guy is a great professor. He receives easy ratings because he is such a good teacher. You will learn a lot in this class and Doran is a great guy. Test are fair and we had one project that was fairly graded and helpful.
This class was the easiest class I have taken. I only attended the first two days and the last day of school and managed to make an A. DORAN FOR PRESIDENT 2016
Great teacher.  He realizes the course is not meant to be hard and doesn't try to make it hard at all.  Easy A for anyone that goes to class. Definitely take him!

Doran is the man. Really nice guy and totally gets what it's like to be a college student. Great teacher who doesn't take himself too seriously. If you're taking geography, make sure he is your teacher.

Interesting class, great professor. You don't have to attend for an A, but I did because the class was great. If you do skip though, don't miss the 2 review days before the exams. Exams are multiple choice online; 1 hour for exam anytime in a 24 hour window. DON"T FORGET. He almost always ends class 20 minutes early. Only grades are the 4 exams.
IF YOU DON'T TAKE HIM, YOU'RE WRONG.

I absolutely love this professor. One of the best at KSU. He's understanding and very clear what he expects out of his students. If you are honest and respectful of him, he's the same with you.  Do your work, get in done in a timely manner, and you will be fine. If you decide to be lazy and not show up, you get what you give.
easy class. Just go to his class and take good notes. He will give you a test question answer for every class you attend.

By far my favorite professor I've ever had, he is extremely helpful and understanding towards his students. He emails frequently to keep the class updated on what is going on and gives out answers to test questions in class. Super nice, wish I could take him again

Prof. Doran is absolutely amazing!!! My favorite professor at KSU. He is extremely helpful and definitely wants his students to succeed. All his tests were online and attendance was not mandatory. I only attended major review sessions that were before the tests and still made an A in the class. He is AWESOME!!!!

HE IS AWESOME. Go to class and take notes and you will make an A. He sticks to a 1 hour teaching rule...LOVE! He always emailed us to remind us about things which he doesn't have to do! Make sure you build a relationship with him, like emailing about questions...he notices that and it will do you a huge favor in the end...TRUST ME. So passionate!!!

I had him 2 years ago and I STILL remember things I learned in his class.  TAKE HIM!  You will learn about the world around you if you show up and pay attention.  He cares so much about geography and teaching, do yourself a favor and register for his class before it's too late!  Great guy, great professor.

LOVED this professor. I wish he taught every subject. You can pass the class easily even without a text book all you need to do is take notes and listen. It's a really great class and I recommend this professor :) HE IS AWESOME!!!!

He is a really great professor. Very knowledgeable about geography. He makes class interesting and is willing to meet with students after class to answer questions. Attendance is not mandatory, but he does give out bonus questions in class. You do not need the book.

GREAT PROFESSOR!! his class isn't mandatory but he does give out bonus questions for the test! you only have 4 tests the whole semester so be sure to go to the review sessions! he's always available to help if you have any questions. his lectures are no more then 30-45 mins. he knows what he's talking about! best professor I've ever had! TAKE HIM!!

Great professor. Each class he gives out bonus questions which are on the test, so I recommend going to class. Barely used the book. He is clear and his classes are never longer than 45 minutes - which I loved. Go to class, and you'll get an A.

This professor was AWESOME!!! Only needed to come to class to take notes. Gave all powerpoints. Tests were online and you could take them with a friend. Don't buy the book. Entertaining professor and likes his geography. Would recommend him for an easy A.

EASY class! Attendance not mandatory! Only 4 tests, all of which are taken online and are 50 Qs with a 75 min time limit. Rarely went to class - only attended review sessions and received an A. TAKE HIM!!!

Best professor I've ever had! He's relatively interesting and if you show up to class he gives bonus questions for the tests. Tests are common sense and super easy, if you don't make A's, you're clearly doing something wrong.
Seems easy but I got B's on his tests. Do not need to come to class he is a nice guy and his lectures only go 30 minutes.

LOVE him! He is one of my favorite professors. Class is easy, he goes over the material well, gives good reviews, and posts notes/exams online. It's hard to fail this course. He does play "devil's advocate" sometimes and leaves politics out of class. Hoping I can take him for my other Geography courses! Lecture hall still felt like a small class :)
Easiest class i've ever taken. All the notes are posted online and all tests are online as well, to be taken at home with the book and notes. Plus, he's actually interested in what he's teaching.
Nice guy his tests are online. Go to class he will give bonus questions that you won't find on Google. Get the book and you will be fine.

Poster child for a midlife crisis. He strives to give off the "too bored to be politically correct" vibe. His tests are all online, the only grades, and the class is a joke. The test questions have multiple possible answers and he'll spend all class going over the online test to prove which answer is "more acceptable."

What more can I say other than I FREAKING LOVE PROF. DORAN!! He is not only interesting but funny. He remembers his students and is more than willing to help you with absolutely anything. He is the greatest geography teacher you can possibly take at KSU. If you need/want an A this is definitely the class to be in.

Definitely an awesome chill laid back kind of teacher. I really enjoyed having him because you could tell he did things that were better for the students, and you could tell he really cared. Attendance isn't mandatory, but he will give out bonus questions if you go to class. Also the only grades are exams and they are online. Easy A
Mr. Doran is the greatest teacher ever! Definitely don't buy the books! He will ask you to, but all the maps you need you can find online. Only 4 tests, nothing else. TAKE HIM

Prof Doran's world history class is an easy A. I recommend taking him. All test are online and open book/notes. you need the book for the region maps, rent it dont buy it or share with a friend. he does not take attendence and post all powerpoints on vista.

He is an excellent professor!!! I am international and I thought it would be tough to understand a GEO class but he made it easy. He doesn't call the roll but he gives bonus questions for everyone who attends class. His exams are online and if you take notes it will be very helpful. I would take him again if I could, he is great!
Easy A. Entertaining and repeats what he says often. No need to buy a text book.

Doran is awesome! Really easy and clarifies everything. Class based off power points but keeps you engaged! Book is good for studying, $3 off amazon. 4 mult. choice tests, drops lowest grade. Reviews the class before the test, attendance not mandatory but recommended for bonus points! Review the PPTs and there is no reason you shouldn't get an A!

Awesome teacher! Great attitude and really knows a lot about Geography. Book is optional and costs like $5 online. Go to class and learn interesting facts..its fun! Plus his test are straight from his lectures and powerpoints. His bonus questions are made known in class. Definitely take him

This is the easiest class I have ever taken! I normally went to class and took some notes, but he has several review class sessions that tell you exactly what you do and do not need to know. Definitely recommend him!

take him! I actually enjoy coming to class because his lectures are interesting. If you come to class and pay attention, you will do well on the tests. He pretty much gives you every test question during his lectures. You do have to pay attention though! Really nice guy and great teacher.
Take him he is great and really funny makes you want to come to class

If you have the chance TAKE HIM!! 4 exams, drops the lowest, give review sessions the class before and 15 minutes before the test. Really passionate about teaching which is good, even if you just go to the review sessions you can get an A but he gives out bonus questions during lectures since attendance isnt required. GREAT TEACHER, TAKE HIM!!!

He is a great prof. and is genuinely excited and interested in what he teaches.Nice guy, good class, a little unorganized but it was his first time teaching this class so its understandable. Learned alot, Would take him again! awesome.
Love, love, LOVE him!  He makes the class interesting and is very personable and funny.  Take this class!!!
Great professor, easy class. I would recommend. Take him.

Easy A If you go to class and take notes. He tells you exactly what he's going to put on his tests and he has two review sessions, one the class before, and another short one right before the test. 4 exams and he drops the lowest.

Mr. Doran is a GREAT teacher, definitely choose him.  Made A's on all my tests.  Attendance not counted, but he does give bonus questions that will be on the test during class for a total of 10 extra points on the test.  During his lectures he carefully points out "This will be on the test." or "This won't be on the test."  Take his class.
Hes a good teacher being that Ive never really liked geography. Class isnt mandatory but his lectures help you out alot on the tests. Cool teacher
Awesome professor. Knows what he is talking about. Pretty hilarious too. Class not mandatory puts everything on Vista. Tests are easy if you show up to class. Great professor highly recommend.
Great Teacher. He knows what he is talking about and is very interested in students doing well in the class. Gives reviews the class before the test. I do Recommend this teacher.

Great professor! Knows what he's talking about and engages the class in his lectures! Attendance is not mandatory. The day before the test he gives a study guide and basically tells you what's on the test! He cracks jokes a lot and is a funny guy! :) Take him!! You won't be disappointed!
Love this teacher, loved the class.  Hope he teaches more and more geography classes!
He was really funny and made class interesting really helpful when it comes t test and you don't need to buy the book!

He really wants his students to do well. He gives review sessions before every test and tells you exactly what will be on it. He's very approachable and has a good sense of humor. He stresses the important stuff but also tells you extra information just because it's interesting. If anyone needs an extra 2 hour course, take GEOG 2105 for sure.

He was an alright teacher. The first few weeks I thought he was interesting but by the end of the semester I dreaded going to class. He can be very repetitive but does have a sense of humor. But like I said before, he's very repetitive with his jokes as well. Tests are easy. They're all multiple choice. Never opened the book.
Great teacher, great sense of humor and awesome class. Very interesting.
Great Professor, great class, tests are strait forward.  Drops the lowest test score. Not your lame Professors, you will enjoy going to his class!! Take him!!
Cool guy. Very knowledgable. Easy A if you pay attention.

This Guy is aweomse! makes it clear what he wants you to learn. Don't have to come to class but if you do you actually learn so its easy to get an A. Great teacher down to earth and knows the material.
He is awesome. one of my best professor so far.

Doran is a cool dude.  TAKE THIS CLASS!  attendance is not mandatory but, if you attend class then you will have no problem making an A.  Even if you don't go to class, you'll still probably get a B.  He's funny and down to earth.  Way different than your typical lame professor.

He is such a great teacher! You don't have to go to his class. but i recommend that you do. If you attend it regularly he may add points to your final at the end of the semester and may boost u up a letter grade. His class is a lot of fun. and u wont be bored! he makes it easy to learn the material one of my fave teachers!

Professor Doran is a great teacher! He is very knowledgable and passionate about the subject. He teaches by lecture using powerpoints and he gives study guides before each test. He loves answering questions so the more you speak up, the more he will notice you and that will benefit students at the end of the semester. Take his class!!

Amazing! Very helpful and he knows what he is talking about. Tends to get off subject sometimes but gets back on track as soon as he realizes it! Tests are multiple choice but he tries to make them a little tricky. Teaches straight from powerpoints that he posts on vista! Take Him!! Easy & Good Class!

Prof. Doran is a joy to be in class with!  He's interesting and never boring.  You can count on an easy A if you attend most every class, especially the review sessions.  Tests are multiple choice.  Be prepared for an easy ride!
